holidays.title: Global Day of Unplugging
holidays.description: Unplug and relax, reflect, be active, visit the outdoors, and connect with loved ones.

holidays.title: National If Pets Had Thumbs Day
holidays.description: Can you imagine what life would be like if our animal friends had that extra digit?

holidays.title: World Wildlife Day
holidays.description: Want to see the Black Rhino off the endangered species list? Let’s do it together.

holidays.title: 33 Flavors Day
holidays.description: 33 Flavors Day is definitely the time to try out new ice cream flavors.

holidays.title: Bulgaria Liberation Day
holidays.description: Join Bulgarians in celebrating an important part of their country’s history on Liberation Day.

holidays.title: Canadian Bacon Day
holidays.description: Delicious, sweet, salty, and crispy — it's time to celebrate Canadian Bacon Day!

holidays.title: Caregiver Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Let’s show our appreciation and recognize the millions of selfless caregivers in the U.S.

holidays.title: Denim Day for Dementia
holidays.description: On Denim Day for Dementia, raise funds for dementia patients by wearing denim.

holidays.title: Iditarod Trail Sled Dog Race
holidays.description: Get ready to join the celebrations around this dog race held in the U.S.

holidays.title: International Ear Care Day
holidays.description: It is our duty as responsible citizens to raise awareness about the importance of ear care.

holidays.title: International Irish Whiskey Day
holidays.description: Klink your glasses together and take a sip of that fine Irish whiskey.

holidays.title: Japan Dolls Festival
holidays.description: Join millions in celebrating the females in the family as we mark the Japan Dolls Festival.

holidays.title: Martyrs' Day in Malawi
holidays.description: Let’s join the people of Malawi to honor the heroes who fought for their nation’s liberation.

holidays.title: Missouri Compromise Day
holidays.description: Let’s go back in time to find out about the significance of the Missouri Compromise!

holidays.title: Mothers' Day in Georgia
holidays.description: Keep reading to find out the history of Mother’s Day all over the world.

holidays.title: National Anthem Day
holidays.description: Learn all about the fateful night which inspired our national anthem and discover ways to celebrate.

holidays.title: National Cold Cuts Day
holidays.description: Check out the cold cut history, really offbeat types of processed meats, and more.

holidays.title: National Dress in Blue Day
holidays.description: Wear your favorite blue outfit today to raise awareness about this deadly disease.

holidays.title: National Employee Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Strong employer-employee relations are at the core of any truly successful business.

holidays.title: National I Want You to be Happy Day
holidays.description: Be the silver lining and brighten someone’s day through simple acts of kindness and selflessness.

holidays.title: National Jackson Day
holidays.description: Celebrate National Jackson Day by learning about the meaning of the name Jackson.

holidays.title: National Moscow Mule Day
holidays.description: Quickly grab that copper cup, we are about to toast and enjoy this classic cocktail!

holidays.title: National Mulled Wine Day
holidays.description: After much mulling, we’ve compiled some awesome ideas to celebrate this day. Check them out!

holidays.title: National Rita Day
holidays.description: Celebrate with Ritas across the country as we mark National Rita Day.

holidays.title: National Robin Day
holidays.description: Show Robins some much-deserved love as we celebrate them on National Robin Day.

holidays.title: National Soup it Forward Day
holidays.description: Grab your spoons, it's time to savor the flavors of a tasty broth and spread kindness.

holidays.title: National Soup It Forward Day
holidays.description: Step into the kitchen, make some hot, delicious soup, and serve it to those in need.

holidays.title: National Speech and Debate Education Day
holidays.description: Join in today’s activities and let’s prepare students for a brighter future and a better world!

holidays.title: Navy Reserves Birthday
holidays.description: It's time to celebrate another milestone in the U.S. Navy Reserve’s history.

holidays.title: Overseas N.H.S. Workers Day
holidays.description: A day to show love and respect to the overseas healthcare workers in the U.K.

holidays.title: Peach Blossom Day
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate the beauty of peach blossoms in bloom and what it symbolizes: women.

holidays.title: Simplify Your Life Day
holidays.description: This is an organizer’s guide to living a simpler, stress-free, financially liberating life.

holidays.title: Talk in Third Person Day
holidays.description: Put on your creativity cap; get ready to talk in the third person for a day!

holidays.title: What If Cats and Dogs Had Opposable Thumbs? Day
holidays.description: Let’s get ready to wrap our brains around the idea of what-ifs.

holidays.title: World Day of Prayer
holidays.description: World Day of Prayer is a truly international day observed in 170 countries across continents.

holidays.title: World Hearing Day
holidays.description: Join us to give ear care the attention it deserves as we mark World Hearing Day.

holidays.title: Buddy Valastro’s Birthday
holidays.description: This baker, television personality, and chef is a pivotal part of the food and entertainment industry.

holidays.title: Camila Cabello’s Birthday
holidays.description: Camila Cabello has worked consistently hard to build an outstanding solo career for herself.
